title: Bar e Restaurante Taru√≠ra
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bahian, Brasilian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers some vegan Bahian dishes which are currently (July 2014) not on the physical menu, but will be in the future. Also intends to add a vegetarian/vegan section but in the meantime just ask for vegan items. Owners want feedback and suggestions for vegan dishes. Has live music a few times per month. Outdoor seating is covered. Located about 50 meters from the beach. Free Wi-Fi.
streetAddress: Rua C Nu 37 Praia da Concha
